posts.body:
https://vrelnir.blogspot.com/2019/08/version-0220.html
>Tuesday, 13 August 2019
>Version 0.2.2.0
>This update adds another school project, which begins three to four weeks into the game. Winning will take a lot of work, but there may be shortcuts. It also adds a related kidnapping scenario, and another job opportunity on Danube Street. Thank you all for playing!
